client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM met Pérez Navarro López during a business conference in Madrid. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
Pérez Navarro López is a 69 year old and comes from Spain.
Julius Baer's exceptional client service and bespoke financial solutions were the main reasons he decided to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Pérez Navarro López is currently divorced. His child is named Cayetana.
client_description_Education_Background:
Pérez received his secondary school diploma from Instituto de Bachillerato Artístico IES Reina Sofia Tenerife in 1974.
He then attended IE University, which he graduated in 1978.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Pérez Navarro López is a 69 year old retired Partner from Spain.
In 1979, Pérez Navarro López started working as a Analyst at KKR Iberia Asesoramiento S.A., marking the beginning of his successful career.
At KKR Iberia Asesoramiento S.A., he held the position of Associate from 1982 to 1984, making significant contributions to the organization.
His tenure as a Investment Director at ProA Capital de Inversión SGEIC S.A. from 1984 to 1986 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
He appointment as a Partner at ProA Capital de Inversión SGEIC S.A. in 1986 marked a significant milestone in his career, as he took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 1990000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
Client does not have any properties.He does not have any inheritances.
client_description_Client_Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
